p: As for previous attempts in vaccine preclinical experimentation to SARS-CoV, virus studies are needed to ascertain the most suitable animal models, especially electing small animals that closely resemble the clinical disease caused by SARS-CoV2 infection in humans and its etiopathogenetic mechanisms [ 16]. These are at low cost and of easy manipulation, and they would present receptor affinity for the virus and generate specific immune responses and protection [ 16].
